definitions.meaning: 用处；效用；帮助（通常指通过利用某物或某机会来达到目的）
definitions.usage: 作为名词，常用于短语如'to no avail'或'of no avail'，表示某事没有效果或没有帮助；也可指某物或某事的用处。作为动词（较少见），表示利用某物或某机会，通常与'reflexive pronoun'（如oneself）连用。

examples.scene: 一位学生在考试前拼命复习，查阅了大量资料，但最终成绩仍然不理想。
examples.chineseIdea: 想表达努力尝试但没有效果，强调付出的努力白费。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She studied tirelessly for the exam, but @ @ @.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She studied tirelessly for the exam, but 「to no avail」.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她为考试不懈地学习，但「毫无效果」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She studied hard but no use.' 纠正：'She studied hard, but to no avail.'（'no use'在这种语境下不自然，'to no avail'更符合英语表达习惯。）

examples.scene: 一位求职者在面试失败后，尝试联系公司HR询问反馈，但没有得到任何回复。
examples.chineseIdea: 想表达尝试做某事但没有成功，突出努力没有结果。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: He reached out to the HR manager for feedback, but it was @ @ @.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: He reached out to the HR manager for feedback, but it was 「of no avail」.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他联系了HR经理寻求反馈，但「毫无用处」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He contacted HR, but it didn't work.' 纠正：'He contacted HR, but it was of no avail.'（'didn't work'过于模糊，'of no avail'更精确。）

definitions.usage: 作为动词，常用在正式语境中，结构为'avail oneself of something'，表示主动利用某资源或机会以达到目的。

examples.scene: 一位大学生听说学校提供免费的职业咨询服务，决定去咨询以规划自己的职业道路。
examples.chineseIdea: 想表达主动利用学校提供的资源来帮助自己。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She decided to @ @ @ the free career counseling services offered by the university.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She decided to 「avail herself of」 the free career counseling services offered by the university.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她决定「利用」大学提供的免费职业咨询服务。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She used the university's career services.' 纠正：'She availed herself of the university's career services.'（'used'过于简单，'avail oneself of'更正式且符合语境。）

examples.scene: 一位创业者参加行业会议，希望通过与投资人交流来寻找资金支持。
examples.chineseIdea: 想表达抓住会议提供的机会与他人建立联系。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: He was eager to @ @ @ @ @ to network with potential investors.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: He was eager to 「avail himself of the opportunity」 to network with potential investors.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他渴望「利用这个机会」与潜在投资者建立联系。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He took the chance to meet investors.' 纠正：'He availed himself of the opportunity to meet investors.'（'took the chance'不够正式，'avail oneself of the opportunity'更贴合语境。）
